raw: Oh, uh, nice to meet you. My name is Drew.
en: Oh, uh, nice to meet you. My name is Drew.
fr: Oh, euh, ravi de vous rencontrer. Je m'appelle Drew.

raw: Sorry, I thought you were someone I knew.
en: Sorry, I thought you were someone I knew.
fr: Désolé, je pensais que tu étais quelqu'un que je connaissais.

raw: I'd love to stay and chat, but this is just a short demo.
en: I'd love to stay and chat, but this is just a short demo.
fr: J'aimerais rester et discuter, mais ce n'est qu'une courte démo.

raw: The person acts as though they were addressing someone else.
en: The person acts as though they were addressing someone else.
fr: La personne agit comme si elle s’adressait à quelqu’un d’autre.
